meanings.definition: A condition characterized by swelling and thickening of the skin, typically caused by underactive thyroid function.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with myxedemas after observing the skin swelling.
meanings.sent2: Many individuals with underactive thyroid experience myxedemas, leading to skin changes.
meanings.sent3: The myxedemas made the person look like they were wearing a puffy skin suit!
meanings.sent4: Her face resembled a balloon filled with water, a clear sign of myxedemas.
meanings.sent5: The myxedemas transformed his appearance into that of a marshmallow man.
